data.message: I love 2 pac and Eminem much love and respect for Eminem for the love he has for pac. Pac deserves that respect and Eminem shows it like he should like I do like anyone that loves 2 pac does and anyone should 2 pac is a legend and will live forever and Eminem is here to hold him down and is the greatest rapper alive and I truly believe 2pac would love and resoect Eminem like he deserves and they would have been friends it's to bad that didn't happen.

replies.message: I believe they would be friends as well...prolly woulda got im some shit together...and helped unite the races a little...Pac was not a racist as some think..He just hated what had been done to his people and he hated crooked cops who abused their authority.
Exactly 2 pac is a great man I know he would have been friends with Eminem. No 2 pac was not racist at all some of his best friends are white.
